casebody.data:
Young, Appellee, v. Cuyahoga County Board of Mental Retardation & Developmental Disabilities, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Young v. Cuyahoga Ctg. Bd. of Mental Retardation & Dev. Disabilities, 131 Ohio St.3d 370, 2012-Ohio-1222.]

(No. 2011-1073 Submitted March 21, 2012 Decided March 27, 2012.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is vacated, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for application of the Eighth District’s en banc *371decision in DiGiorgio v. Cleveland, 196 Ohio App.3d 575, 2011-Ohio-5824, 964 N.E.2d 495.

Spangenberg, Shibley & Liber, L.L.P., Peter J. Brodhead, Stuart E. Scott, Nicholas A. Dicello, and Melissa Z. Kelly; and Mark S. Fishman, for appellee. Tomino & Latchney, L.L.C., L.P.A, and Nick C. Tomino, for appellant. O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
